name: Pretty Please
description:
A short game about a lady who goes into a beauty clinic to "fix a few things". features several endings and beautiful artwork, made for GameZanga gamejam.

The game contains 497 dialogue blocks, containing 3,644 words and 19,587
characters, for an average of 7.3 words and 39 characters per block.

The game contains 11 menus, 15 images, and 14 screens, and a total of 3 possible endings.
